short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Features a stunning background that showcases the iconic figure of Optimus Prime.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This powerful image captures the essence of strength and bravery, illuminating each new tab you open. With its vibrant colors and intricate details, the background serves as a constant reminder of a warrior ready to protect justice and fight against evil. The striking visuals of Optimus Prime create an inspiring atmosphere, motivating you in your daily tasks while immersing you in the world of this legendary hero.

Some useful features:
- Notepad
- ToDo
- Links
- Apps
- History
- Bookmarks
- Downloads
- Search box
- Clock
